<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Prints <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/avr">AVR</a> instructions to a textual stream.

## Public Member Functions

### printInst() {#a17adee37669068124e468fdc414437a7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::AVRInstPrinter::printInst (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &#42; MI, uint64&#95;t Address, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Annot, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &amp; STI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Print the specified <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> to the specified <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a>.

<code>Address</code> the address of current instruction on most targets, used to print a PC relative immediate as the target address. On targets where a PC relative immediate is relative to the next instruction and the length of a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> is difficult to measure (e.g. x86), this is the address of the next instruction. If Address is 0, the immediate will be printed.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/avr/lib/target/avr/mctargetdesc/avrinstprinter-h/#l00032">32</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/avr/lib/target/avr/mctargetdesc/avrinstprinter-h">AVRInstPrinter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/avr/lib/target/avr/mctargetdesc/avrinstprinter-cpp/#l00034">34</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/avr/lib/target/avr/mctargetdesc/avrinstprinter-cpp">AVRInstPrinter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
